quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: You can observe a lot just by watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Don't fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I don't believe in failure. It's not failure if you enjoyed the process.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched... but are felt in the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
quotes.author: Cavour

quotes.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: We must be as courteous to a man as we are to a picture, which we are willing to give the advantage of a good light.
quotes.author: Ralph Emerson

quotes.quote: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Ellen Parr

quotes.quote: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Be like the flower, turn your face to the sun.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Remembering a wrong is like carrying a burden on the mind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: James Openheim

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Beecher

quotes.quote: If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You cannot have what you do not want.
quotes.author: John Acosta

quotes.quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go, instead, where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is not fair to ask of others what you are unwilling to do yourself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The best thing in every noble dream is the dreamer...
quotes.author: Moncure Conway

quotes.quote: Weve got to have a dream if we are going to make a dream come true.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If you want things to be different, perhaps the answer is to become different yourself.
quotes.author: Norman Peale

quotes.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Theodore Rubin

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones weve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Those who cannot learn from history are doomed to repeat it.
quotes.author: George Santayan

quotes.quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Just as a flower, which seems beautiful has color but no perfume, so are the fruitless words of a man who speaks them but does them not.
quotes.author: Dhammapada

quotes.quote: Things that were hard to bear are sweet to remember.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Three things in human life are important. The first is to be kind. The second is to be kind. The third is to be kind.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: However many holy words you read, However many you speak, What good will they do you If you do not act on upon them?
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Learn to listen. Opportunity could be knocking at your door very softly.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what Ive had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Just as much as we see in others we have in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
quotes.author: Geoffrey F. Abert

quotes.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: We cannot direct the wind but we can adjust the sails.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: One may say the eternal mystery of the world is its comprehensibility.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as being able to remake ourselves.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Moments of complete apathy are the best for new creations.
quotes.author: Philip Breedveld

quotes.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: To dream of the person you would like to be is to waste the person you are.
quotes.author: Tim Menchen

quotes.quote: The important thing is this: to be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.
quotes.author: Charles Dubois

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the paren't of all the others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: It is never too late. Even if you are going to die tomorrow, keep yourself straight and clear and be a happy human being today.
quotes.author: Lama Yeshe

quotes.quote: Respect is not something that you can ask for, buy or borrow. Respect is what you earn from each person no matter their background or status.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Things do not change; we change.
quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

quotes.quote: We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Learn wisdom from the ways of a seedling. A seedling which is never hardened off through stressful situations will never become a strong productive plant.
quotes.author: Stephen Sigmund

quotes.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: All men have a sweetness in their life. That is what helps them go on. It is towards that they turn when they feel too worn out.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of mediation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
quotes.author: John Marshall

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Live through feeling and you will live through love. For feeling is the language of the soul, and feeling is truth.
quotes.author: Matt Zotti

quotes.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Reason and free inquiry are the only effectual agents against error.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: See the positive side, the potential, and make an effort.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: By accepting yourself and being fully what you are, your presence can make others happy.
quotes.author: Jane Roberts

quotes.quote: Never deny a diagnosis, but do deny the negative verdict that may go with it.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on man unless they act.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If you propose to speak, always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical.Expect more than others think is possible.
quotes.author: Cadet Maxim

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
quotes.author: Hausa

quotes.quote: Your ability to learn faster than your competition is your only sustainable competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Arie de Gues

quotes.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Sometimes the cards we are dealt are not always fair. However you must keep smiling and moving on.
quotes.author: Tom Jackson
